abstract: G4S, the world's biggest provider of security services, agreed to buy a Danish rival, ISS, for about $8.2 billion with debt, accelerating its expansion in Asia and Latin America.

headline.main: G4S to Buy Danish Security Rival ISS for $8.2 Billion
